verses.name: Psalms 71:6
verses.text: By thee have I been holden up from the womb: thou art he that took me out of my mother’s bowels: my praise shall be continually of thee.

verses.name: Psalms 71:7
verses.text: I am as a wonder unto many; but thou art my strong refuge.

verses.name: Psalms 71:8
verses.text: Let my mouth be filled with thy praise and with thy honour all the day.

verses.name: Psalms 71:9
verses.text: Cast me not off in the time of old age; forsake me not when my strength faileth.

verses.name: Psalms 71:10
verses.text: For mine enemies speak against me; and they that lay wait for my soul take counsel together,
